hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn 'Umar:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) as saying: If anyone trails his garment arrogantly, Allah will not look at him on the Day of Resurrection. Then Abu Bakr said: One of the sides of my lower garment trails, but still I remain careful about it. He said: You are not one of those who do so conceitedly

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي إِسْبَالِ الإِزَارِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Reported Regarding Isbal With The Izar
